sections.status: labs are problem solving sessions only. In addition, this class has three mandatory in-person meetings at 2:30-3:55pm on Tuesdays 2/24, 4/7, and 5/19 for exams. All other instructions are provided online through the college learning management system Canvas and Zoom. Access to a computer with a webcam and a microphone is required. Go to www.dvc.edu/online for course access information.
